setting.time: 1930s Moscow, same supernatural night, mysterious study
setting.location: Elegant study chamber existing in supernatural space, filled with books and manuscripts
setting.weather: Interior, warm firelight and candlelight illumination

characters.appearance: Distinguished man, ageless appearance, dark hair, piercing eyes, now in private setting, more intimate demeanor
characters.clothing: Black formal wear, slightly loosened from ball formality, cape draped over chair
characters.position: Standing behind ornate desk covered with papers and manuscripts
characters.action: Presenting thick manuscript with ceremonial gesture, slight smile on face

characters.appearance: Woman, early 30s, beautiful features, now restored to human form but still radiant
characters.clothing: Elegant gown that appeared mysteriously, hair still crowned with flowers
characters.position: Standing across desk from host, reaching toward offered manuscript
characters.action: Extending trembling hands toward manuscript, expression of wonder and disbelief

scene.mainElements: Luxurious study with floor-to-ceiling bookshelves, ornate desk, comfortable reading chairs, fireplace
scene.details: Countless books and manuscripts filling shelves from floor to ceiling, ornate writing desk with leather inlay, silver inkwell and pens, comfortable leather chairs near crackling fireplace, Persian rugs on polished floors, candlesticks providing warm light
scene.background: More bookshelves extending into shadowy depths, glimpses of rare manuscripts and ancient texts, mysterious doorways leading to other chambers
scene.atmosphere: Sacred moment of restoration, impossible gift being bestowed, literary sanctuary where destroyed works can be reborn, warmth and comfort after ball's grandeur, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot across desk emphasizing exchange of manuscript
composition.focus: The manuscript changing hands, symbol of art's indestructibility
composition.depth: Foreground: ornate desk with manuscript as central element; middle ground: two figures in moment of exchange; background: endless bookshelves fading into warm shadows
